Key Match Events: The Pacers rebounded from a 37-point loss to the Celtics two nights earlier by beating them 123-114 in the rematch.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics lost their sixth game at home already this season. Last season, they went 37-4 at TD Garden during the regular season and 9-2 in the playoffs en route to the NBA championship.
Others: Tyrese Haliburton scored 31 points for the Pacers, and Jayson Tatum had 22 points for the Celtics.
